
RapidEnv development environment
  Project: test, Tag: main

Properties:
  = my_osspecific_path = "/opt/postgres"
  p my_perso_prop = "xyz"
  = myapp.home = "@RAPIDENV_HOME@/testdata/testinstall/myapp/1.0.2"
  p otherapp.data = "@RAPIDENV_HOME@/testdata/testinstall/OtherappData"

Install units:
  = myapp 1.0.2
  = otherapp 1.0
